title: Korea

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Raise a target’s attack or defense by one stage at night.
- Raise a target’s attack or defense by two stages at night. (Costs 3 gold.)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Raising attack only lasts for 3 days and 3 nights.
- You cannot raise attack of roles with no kill capability. If you try, you will silently fail.
- Raising defense only lasts until your target is attacked. You will not be notified if your defense wore off.
- Your targets will be notified when their attack or defense is raised.
- Your effects can stack.
- Your effects do not apply until the start of the next day.
- You can target yourself with defense.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
“They were impaled by a Korean hwacha.” (Factional Kill)
“Your weapons were modernized!” (Raising Attack)
“Your armor was modernized!” (Raising Defense)

desc:
